articles.title: RFK Jr. Can’t Fix America’s Health—And He Isn’t Even Trying - The Bulwark
articles.description: MAHA is sickening in more ways than one.
articles.content: WHEN ROBERT F. KENNEDY JR. was named secretary of health and human services, a certain kind of voter was thrilled. Some were Democrats, some were Republicans, and others were independents, but they w… [+6535 chars]
